sub_title: Lead Logistics Specialist at Process and Pipeline Services at Baker Hughes
summary:
Expertise in strategic forward-planning, cost reduction, cargo consolidation, operating within the tight financial disciplines imposed by ambitious budgets which I have helped to plan, implementing of Supply Chain procedures, customs formalities, and the application of modern leadership methods (through involvement in both decision-making and target-setting, clarity in communication, and easy personal inter-relations). 
Experience in customs and internal auditing, inventory control capabilities, logistics co-ordination, customs payments control. Good SAP, Oracle / Maximo skills. 
Planning and organizational skills, ability to manage multiple priorities.

location.default: Son en Breugel, North Brabant, Netherlands

profile_positions.title: Lead Logistics Specialist Europe & Africa regions

profile_positions.description:
•	In charge of Import and Export Operations for different Projects in the Netherlands, Georgia and Azerbaijan. (WREP SRP, Shah Denis 2, OCTP, TurkStream, etc).
•	Full logistics set up in Georgia (contracts with vendors, SAP set up, processes)
•	Freight Organisation within European Union
•	Domestic transportation within the Netherlands, Georgia, Azerbaijan
•	Import and Export Operations to / from the Netherlands, Georgia and Azerbaijan, which include PO creation, import / export customs formalities, international freight organisation. 
•	Training coordination: creation of Training Matrix for all personnel for specifically dedicated Project in regards with contract requirements and provided services for Customer. 
•	Control of certificates (including Medical Check certificates in accordance with OGUK) validity and timely notification if refresh or new training is required
•	Procurement: purchase orders processing, negotiation with 3rd party vendors, intercompany orders from different locations, control cargo readiness. Act as a focal point during mobilisation and operational phases.
•	In direct contact with vendors to ensure that the requirement for each purchase is clearly defined in terms of import country specific requirements. 
•	Directly working with local and international vendors to ensure they issue and submit service invoices for payments in accordance with specific requirements and instructions from BHGE Azerbaijan, Georgia and the Netherlands as well as in terms of contract.
